entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add Option to Start IHostedService Instances According to Dependency Resolution Order #99846
  • [mono] Implement generic support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #99830
    9.0.0
  • Implicit DateTime to DateTimeOffset conversion throws exception. An analyzer could help catch? #99828
  • [release/8.0] va_start/va_end compile time errors with clang 18 + libstdc++ 14 #99825
  • [API Proposal]: Add File.WriteAllBytes taking ReadOnlySpan<byte> #99823
  • Signature validation error - Microsoft Services Store Api #99821
  • [mono] Add ByRefLike type check of generic parameters for inheritance cases #99820
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Lack of generic parameter constraint checks between derived and parent interfaces #99819
    9.0.0
  • Can we add a way to add attributes without requiring a dependency on their assembly? #99817
  • Higher Memory Usage for the EventSource Class #99816
  • Getting intermittent 403 while making HttpPost call using Client Certificate Authentication in .net6 #99812
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'parent->OperGet() == oper' during 'LSRA allocate' #99810
  • JIT: `impImportCall` fat pointer handling appends call node with `CHECK_SPILL_NONE` #99808
    9.0.0
  • Does mono support partially aot partially interpreted runs #99807
  • High memory usages on "AMD EPYC 7R13 Processor" #99804
  • [browser][MT] wait.value.then is not a function #99801
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Investigate precision of the vectorized TensorPrimitives implementations. #98861
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Unexpected tree op after call marked as tailcall"' #99798
    9.0.0
  • SignalRClientTests fail with "PlaywrightException: Target closed" #99483
  • [browser][mt] Provide API to start the web workers later #75629
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Invalid method header format 1 #99395
    9.0.0
  • C# Have TryGetNonEnumeratedCount check for IReadOnlyCollection<T> #99774

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete src/installer/tests/scripts/linux-test #99848
    area-Host
  • Delete TestProjectFixture and associated helpers #99847
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add additional checks to optimization of constant static field loads #99845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99844
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99843
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Disable time tracking in wasm release builds because it's expensive #99841
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Harden SecKeyCopyExternalRepresentation against sensitive keys #99840
    area-System.Security
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/6.0-staging` #99837
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] use regular POSIX portable threadpool #99836
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use MemoryMarshal.Cast in a few places #99835
    area-Meta
  • Use safer/simpler span construction in a few places #99834
    area-Meta
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough check in optFindLoopCompactionInsertionPoint #99827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Split the negative ref struct substitution testcases to enable the one working with Mono #99826
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] CI was broken for wasm debugger tests #99824
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use templated encoding helpers for signed and unsigned immediates #99815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasm] Fix "we can't find snapshot urls" #99814
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Load RtlRestoreContext dynamically and add fallback for old OSes #99813
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Codespaces need more disc to succeed building on container creation #99803
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Fix building ILC in Visual Studio #99799
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: fix synthetic profile check option, track improper headers #99795
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make the repro project work with x86 Windows #99800
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] disable optimizations for PopCount #99832
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.4
  • [mt][browser] Prevent `SignalRClientTests` fail with "PlaywrightException: Target closed" #99537
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Revise a number of TP precision tolerances #99831
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99624
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Type fat pointer locals precisely, and avoid unnecessary normalization in inlining #99806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • DATAS fixes distribute_other_procs for small heap counts #99802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK check when optimizing branch to empty unconditional #99790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • disable optimizations for PopCount #99796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Avoid using native layout info to calculate register flags for small structs where possible #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix hijack #99809
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use JitEnableOptionalRelocs in getHelperFtn #99791
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid OrderBy.ToArray/ToList overheads for length 1 #99639
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
  • Disable new warnings introduced with clang 18 #99811
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up some [InlineArray] use #99766
    needs-area-label
  • Add missing reference to native library #99765
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Fix Swift multireg stores in presence of `GT_RELOAD` #99789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete workaround #99797
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Remove ActiveIssue for a closed issue #99769
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Fix alignment for vector types #99589
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Implement GetConservativeUpperBoundForOutgoingArgs #99726
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify mono's custom assertions #99780
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Enable publishing in VMR #99432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding `Avx10v1` to the runtime #99784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx10
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Analyze recursive interfaces in illink #99566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • BinaryWriter perf improvements #99775
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough quirk in fgFindInsertPoint #99783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix failing BerConverterTests.Decode_TestData test #99793
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Various optimizations for box patterns used in byreflike struct generics #99684
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #99632
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading.Tasks, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Do not set the code offsets for BBF_INTERNAL blocks #99662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix struct info value in crossgen2 #99602
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use \e instead of \u001B or \x1B #99659
    area-Meta
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fold always false type checks #99761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILCompiler: Fix values of IsSupported for HW intrinsics on 32-bit platforms #99753
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Add old design docs from mono website. #99755
    documentation, area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/6.0-staging] [HTTP/2] Fix handling of effectively empty DATA frame (#99502) #99678
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0][browser] WebSocket works differently depending on if we look up its state or not #99673
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Replace FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS in JIT with runtime switch #99191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix: Using TypeBuilder as generic argument for a parent type throws #99771
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure NuGet.Localization is updated as part of the NuGet code flow #39559
  • Retrieving assembly version or other related info without reflection #39555
  • Dotnet Local tool installs should be versioned out of `Directory.Packages.props` if available #39554
  • MSBuild: Custom Target after Publish runs before AoT binary is in publish directory #39549

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2405732 #39546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39547
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add MSI Installation Tests #38782
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • dotnet watch refactoring #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39531
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #8012

Updated

  • Add proposal for state machine restriction updates #7994

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler could generate better IL for collection expressions #72568
  • Add code fix for CS9176: There is no target type for the collection literal. #72567
  • Collection expression IL could be simplified for single span element #72566
  • Roslyn doesn't include cursor position marker $0 in await snippet edit text #72564
  • Then using extract method it does not respect the selection #72561
    Backlog
  • The server disconnected unexpectedly when using the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild v4.9.2 #72558
  • Compiler doesn't terminate on file with syntax errors #72557

Closed

  • Unexpected `case BoundKind.UnconvertedCollectionExpression` in `CSharpOperationFactory.Create` #72559
  • Roslyn and .Net disagree about converting double.NaN to long #72526
  • Parameter Info may not be shown after a named argument #66962
    17.10
  • Another COR_E_FAILFAST (-2146232797), courtesy of new() #72448
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Localize 17.10 branch #72570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix #69628 Analyzer summary should show suppressor ID #72569
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix excessive compilation times due to speculative parsing after an incomplete string #72565
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove notification on diagnostic updates in inline-diagnostics #72562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • ExternalAccess.Xaml fixes #72560
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix LspFileChangeWatcher case sensitivity #72555
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove UnconvertedCollectionExpression case from CSharpOperationFactory #72563
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow ref structs to implement interfaces, respect "allows ref struct" during constraints check. #72537
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Bind child expressions within bad stackalloc expression to natural type #72454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • The RenameFlyout and DisposableToolTip do not use some color tokens correctly #72538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Have pull-diagnostics respect the flag to to not run during perf runs #72556
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add explicit package reference to System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow #72554
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Do not report unchanged files in workspace-pull diagnostics #72529
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in NodeExtensions.LogTables #72536
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InputSelect does not bind correctly to Nullable<bool> #54565
  • /usr/share/dotnet/sdk/8.0.202/Sdks/Microsoft.NET.Sdk/targets/Microsoft.NET.Sdk.FrameworkReferenceResolution.targets(491,5): error NETSDK1082: There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #54564
  • Perf improvement: updates #54563
  • webapi template uses HttpsRedirection and .http files redirect silently #54562
  • builder.Services.AddDataProtection().PersistKeysToFileSystem() how to ensure 100% availability when a web farm of servers are using a single file share to decrypt and validate an AntiForgeryToken #54561
  • "Onclick" JavaScript invocations no longer working after upgrade to .NET 8.0 from .NET 7.0 #54560
  • Issue with Failed to load resource: net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #54559
  • shaw 256 Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource .net 8 #54558
  • Net7 regression: Kestrel HttpRequestHeaders doesn't enumerate "Content-Length" unless there's another known header also present. #54557
  • Error hard to debug because of minified JS #54555
  • Unhandled exceptions are being logged before custom IExceptionHandler is being called #54554
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #54549
  • Multiple ways to short-circuit pipeline is a poor design and should be reconsidered #54548
  • Idea: Stateless Blazor components #54547

Closed

  • Add ability to change sort order for files displayed when DirectoryBrowserExtensions.UseDirectoryBrowser is executed #29539
    Backlog
  • Authentication.WsFederation breaks with on-premise AD FS use #52099
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #54535
    9.0-preview3
  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries, plainTextWithFilter #54512
  • enhancedload in Blazor Hybrid/MAUI and WebAssembly Hosted #54463
  • Problem with using AuthorizeView in blazor with prerendering #54407
  • Allow access to the RequestDelegate instance from middleware #54237
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify Publishing.props #54566
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e1a38bc` to `c231e6f` #54552
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix components-e2e logging issues #54556
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "No CLR runtime found" analyzing Linux .NET 6.0.26 crash dump #4555

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature Request: WebView Support for Android Meta Quest in .NET MAUI #21242
  • [Testing] Split up UI Tests into separate pipelines by category or groups of categories #21241
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage IsGestureEnabled not working on Android #21240
  • CollectionView ItemsUpdatingScrollMode and deselect not working on macOS #21236
  • [8.0.3] Grid can't calculate size for internal elements. #21234
    Backlog
  • Parent doesn't listen the gestures from its child #21227
  • Random crash in Maui involving get_StrokeDashPattern #21225
  • CollectionView Header and Footer not shown in Windows #21224
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Testing, Windows] Add tests to validate DataTemplateSelector WinUI #20926
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [iOS] CollectionView containing a Footer and a Border with StrokeThickness set to decimal value crashes on scroll #20294
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [iOS] Grouped CollectionView with a Footer stutters under MAUI 8.0.6 #20320
    .NET 8 SR4
  • CollectionView is not currently being Garbage Collected #20710
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [regression/8.0.0] [iOS] .net8 MAUI CollectionView very laggy inside a grid and one row is set to "Auto" #17900
    Backlog
  • Window was already created #21178
  • [WinUI] Cannot customize FlyoutView easily #21198
  • Unable to create XUnit Project referencing .NET 8 MAUI #21138
  • DatePicker and TimePicker Focused and Unfocused events do not fire #21221
  • SecureStorage in iOS simulator #21195
  • [Windows] Webview memory leak #21194
  • DatePicker crashing the app in MAUI dotnet 8 #21226
  • Issue when Debugging FirstMAUI App #21213
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix CanvasImageSource scaling behavior (SR3) #21239
  • Rework foreground color and remove outdated methods #21238
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨
  • [Trimming][Windows] Simplify ActivityIndicator foreground color setting #21230
  • [C] use ResourcesChanged to propagate Theme #21229
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • [Windows] Add scrolling tests for virtualization w/ Datatemplates #20954
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • [testing] Add CollectionView MemoryLeak test #21237
  • [iOS] Fix UI loop when setting ContentInset #21140
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix XmlType .Equals override #21192
    area/Xaml </>
  • [testing] Cleaning up TemplateTests iOS simulator issues #20817
    area/testing

Updated

  • [Windows] Fix FontImageSource resize behavior #21212
    platform/windows 🪟, control-button, i/regression
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.6 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [ios] fix memory leak in RadioButton #21151
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [android] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #21218
    platform/android 🤖, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating back #20420
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, area/gestures
  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/controls 🎮, stale
  • Create collect-dotnet-info.ps1 #21223
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/iOS 🍎, control-window
  • Add missing Android Systemfonts #21207
  • [Testing] Ported legacy tests to Appium #21175
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [X] Allow using x:Type and type literals interchangeably in certain scenarios #20915
    area/Xaml </>
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to coalesce values when navigating nullable relationships? #33336
  • Enforce child entity concrete type regarding the parent concrete type in a TPH scenario #33332
  • `00000000000005_Migration5` in `MigrationsInfrastructureTestBase` assumes that `int Bar` is `string Bar` #33331
  • ValueConverter not applied to operands on ExecuteUpdateAsync #33330
  • UseCosmos with managed identity is not working correct #33328

Closed

  • Support for expressions when configuring composite keys #33114
  • How to model a schema with an abstract base entity in TPH strategy ? #33224
  • Model creation performance regresssion from 8.0.1 to 8.0.2 #33274
  • Circular dependency detected for table with no foreign keys #33154
  • Feature request: `ExecuteAssert` #33329
  • Two different DbConnections in two DbContext. Is it possible? #33306
  • Sqlite migrations for concurrency tokens #33316
  • Add Migration NullReferenceException after EF Core 8 upgrade #33318
  • Two different entities for one table #33320

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use the final 1ES images #33324

Updated

  • Update CODEOWNERS #33322
  • Implement precompiled queries #33297

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Potential off-by-one in versions for runtime packs/app hosts/etc for .NET 7 vs .NET 6? #19067

PullRequests

Created

  • Migrate VMR pipeline to 1ES templates #19073
  • Update SDK diff and artifacts sizes baseline #19066
  • Create and publish VerticalAssetManifest #19062
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #19061

Merged

  • Move sdkArchiveDiff into installer.proj #19069
